So what's new with the iPad?
Well, the most important new spec is that it's thinner than ever.
6.1 millimeters: thinner than the thinnest tablet we've had in our labs,...
The new 8-megapixel camera has improved specs over previous iPads, which had five.
But it still doesn't match the camera specs on the iPhone 6.
They claim it should be 40% faster.
...which our tests confirm can be faster than conventional Wi-Fi connections.
